item.title: Why is Containerization Taking Over?
item.description: An important sign of Kubernetes momentum is the continuing shift to production, growing from 59% in the 2020 report to 65% this year. Companies with more than 500 developers were more likely to be running all or most containerized workloads in production (78%). In our first State of Kubernetes report in 2018, less than a third (30%) reported running Kubernetes in production.
